titleStmt.title: Gloria Britanica [sic] or, A panegyrick, on his sacred Majesties passage thorow the City of London, to his coronation, on the 23 of April, 1661. Likewise another on S. Georges Day.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.B. for Andrew Crook, at the Green Dragon in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
